comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; it; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101206 Ubuntu/10.10 (maverick) Firefox/3.6.13
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101208 Thunderbird/3.1.7

Please add support for the "teletu.it" mail domain to the Autoconfiguration procedure of Thunderbird.

Reproducible: Always




See the attached XML file and http://ispdb.mozillamessaging.com/details/1194 for further information.
Please note that the user name that shall be used for authentication is NOT the user's e-mail address - it is a special user name (format: xxx-xxx-xxx@teletu.it) that is given by the ISP when the account is established. I have tried logging in using my e-mail address as user name and it currently works, but this feature is officially unsupported (the ISP recommends using the "special user name" form described above; see http://supporto.teletu.it/assistenza-tecnica/configurazioni/client-posta-elettronica/ - in Italian).
comments.creator: alessandro.menti@hotmail.it
comments.author: alessandro.menti@hotmail.it

Please add support for the "teletu.it" mail domain to the Autoconfiguration procedure of Thunderbird.

Reproducible: Always




See the attached XML file and http://ispdb.mozillamessaging.com/details/1194 for further information.
Please note that the user name that shall be used for authentication is NOT the user's e-mail address - it is a special user name (format: xxx-xxx-xxx@teletu.it) that is given by the ISP when the account is established. I have tried logging in using my e-mail address as user name and it currently works, but this feature is officially unsupported (the ISP recommends using the "special user name" form described above; see http://supporto.teletu.it/assistenza-tecnica/configurazioni/client-posta-elettronica/ - in Italian).

Created attachment 510119
XML autoconfiguration file

Original entry: http://ispdb.mozillamessaging.com/details/1194

comments.raw_text:
From 1 April 2015 the services and offerings of Teletu change their name to Vodafone

Teletu.it
 POP3:  pop.teletu.it, 110,  plain, password-cleartext
 SMTP: smtp.teletu.it, 587,  plain, password-cleartext
 username: %EMAILADDRESS%


 Documentation
  * [lang=it] Thunderbird - Client posta elettronica - Configurazioni - Assistenza tecnica - TeleTu Supporto
     [lang=en] Thunderbird - E-Mail Client - Configurations - Support - Support TeleTu
    * http://supporto.teletu.it/assistenza-tecnica/configurazioni/client-posta-elettronica/thunderbird/




Vodafone
 IMAP: imap.vodafone.it, 993,    SSL, password-cleartext
 POP3:  pop.vodafone.it, 995,    SSL, password-cleartext
 SMTP: smtp.vodafone.it,  25,  plain, password-cleartext
 username: %EMAILLOCALPART%


 Documentation
  * [lang=it] Configurazione Email su cellulare / [lang=en] Configuring Email on mobile phones.
    * http://www.vodafone.it/portal/Privati/Supporto/Tariffe-e-Prodotti/Configurazioni/Configurazione-smartphone/SMS--MMS--Email--Internet/Configurazione-Email-su-cellulare
comments.creator: chief_uk_2613@yahoo.co.uk
comments.author: chief_uk_2613@yahoo.co.uk
